plugin.name: cassandra-orm
plugin.author: Bob Florian
plugin.title: Cassandra Object Persistence Framework
plugin.description: \ Provides GORM-like dynamic methods for persisting Groovy objects into Cassandra (but does not implement the GORM API). It also adds a number of dynamic methods and arguments specific to typical Cassandra usage, like the ability to specify consistency level and manipulate counters. Must me used in concert with the cassandra-astyanax plugin.
